item.title: ScryOne Privacy Policy
item.description: This policy applies to all information collected or submitted on John Davis' website and ScryOne for iPhone, iPad and any other devices and platforms. INFORMATION WE COLLECT ScryOne is a consumption-only application. The widgets are configured to pull from public scryfall APIs. GITHUB This website is hosted by GITHUB. They have access to some basic technical information to perform this role, such as your IP address. APPLE Crash reports, logs, and rudimentary usage information are collected by Apple and provided to us in order to fix problems that result in an application crash.
